function.name: savedata
function.description: Saves the variable value to the local file uri. The optional parameters append, overwrite and createdirs are booleans. By default, required dirs will be created, existing files will be overwritten and not appended.The optional parameter encoding defaults to “UTF-8”. Acceptable values are “US-ASCII”, “ISO-8859-1”, “UTF-8”, “UTF-16BE”, “UTF-16LE”, and “UTF-16”. Any other values depend on your used java implementation.
